entitymodel.title: Entity of an Apache OFBiz Component

field.name: serviceName
field.description: Deprecated : use customMethod pattern instead of. Kept for backward compatibility

view-entity.title: Main Assoc From and DataResource View Entity
Main Assoc To and DataResource View Entity
Content and DataResource for SubContent View Entity

field.name: objectInfo
field.description: For Short Text the text goes here.

field.name: relatedDetailId
field.description: Depending on the dataResourceTypeId this can point to other entities, like: Survey, SurveyResponse, etc.

field.name: isPublic
field.description: If this is set to Y then anyone can download it, otherwise the download is restricted.

field.name: visitId
field.description: To be able to keep preferences for a non loggin in user for the current session

field.name: isAnonymous
field.description: Allow response to the survey without login?

field.name: allowMultiple
field.description: Allow multiple responses to this survey (if Y), or just a single answer (if N)?

view-entity.title: Survey Question And Application View Entity

field.name: surveyMultiRespColId
field.description: Used to optionally associate this question to a specific column in the Multi-Response set; with this you can associate a single question to each cell in the question/column grid; this is useful for AcroForm round trips where the target PDF needs a question associated with each cell, or even the same question applied with different externalFieldRef values.

field.name: externalFieldRef
field.description: External field ID/reference; for AcroForms used to track the field ID

field.name: withSurveyQuestionId
field.description: These two with* fields are used to specify that this question should only appear if the with option has been selected for the with question.

relation.description: This does not have a foreign key because the surveyId will never be null, and we want the surveyPageSeqId to be optional.
This does not have a foreign key because the surveyId will never be null, and we want the surveyMultiRespId to be optional.

view-entity.title: Survey Response And Answer View Entity

field.name: surveyMultiRespColId
field.description: This is needed to support multiple responses for different MultiResp Columns; if not part of a MultiResp will be _NA_

field.name: surveyMultiRespId
field.description: This is not part of the primary key, but should be populated so that the SurveyMultiRespColumn can be more easily looked up.

field.name: helpContentId
field.description: Used to give contentId which will be shown when help on this page will be called

field.name: webAnalyticsCode
field.description: copy in here the analitics javascript code without the beginning- and end<script> tags
